description:
A 700-year-old half vampire. He is the son of Count Bloodeau who is said to be "cousin of the husband of Count Dracula`s sister". While he is currently a disciple of Father Karasu, he used to know Karasu years before. He also goes to the same school as Yokoshima, and because of his handsome look, he`s very popular with many girls, including Emi.
Source: Wiki
name: Pietro de Bloodeau
